sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import pic from "../blankPicture.png"; const MembershipInformationModal = ({ member, onClose }) => { if (!member) return null; // Create a Date object from member.memberSince const memberSinceDate = new Date(member.memberSince); // Format the date to "Month Day, Year" const options = { year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' }; const formattedDate = memberSinceDate.toLocaleDateString('en-US', options); return (

{member.fullName}

Member Information

Membership ID: {member.memberId}

Member since: {formattedDate}

Age: {member.age}

Gender: {member.gender}

Contact No: {member.contactNumber}

Address: {member.address}

Financial Information

Shared Capital:

{member.sharedCapital}

Savings:

{member.savings}

Loan Limit:

{member.loanLimit}

Dividend:

{member.dividend}

Account Information

Email:

{member.email}

Password:

{member.password}

{/* Uncomment if needed
*/}
); }; export default MembershipInformationModal;
